text:
Sep tender 18, 1953
Mr. Allen Miller
Director, Region VI
Station KWSC
State College of Washington
Pullman, Washington
Dear Allen:
I have just returned to my desk from six weeks
away from Chapel Hill end am beginning to bore my way
through piles of correspondence,,
This letter deals with your memo concerning the
tap© network. I heartily agree with your conviction that
NAEB should hang on to the tape network. This is my
position and I don8t intend to change It.
Director, Region II
W dn
cc: Members of th© Board
